articles.author: F1
articles.title: 'Disappointed' Zhou apologises for his part in opening lap incident at Hungarian GP - Formula 1
articles.description: Zhou Guanyu was full of remorse for the part he played in the opening lap collision at the Hungarian Grand Prix – with the Alfa Romeo driver also giving an insight into where it all went wrong for him at the start of the race.
articles.content: Zhou Guanyu was full of remorse for the part he played in the opening lap collision at the Hungarian Grand Prix with the Alfa Romeo driver also giving an insight into where it all went wrong for him … [+3162 chars]

articles.title: Paul Craig: If Khamzat Chimaev Takes Me Down, Good Chance He'll Get Triangled | UFC Fight Night 224 - MMA Junkie
articles.description: UFC Fight Night 224 winner Paul Craig talks to MMA Junkie and other reporters post-fight after his TKO victory over Andre Muniz in London.Full event coverage...
